name: Snoek Fish Curry
description: Canned snoek fish curry, Southern favorite
instructions: Add curry leaves (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
cultural_notes: Popular store-cupboard meal Use fresh fish from coastal markets. Goraka (garcinia) is essential for authentic sour taste - never substitute with tamarind. The curry should have a deep red color from roasted spices.
description_sinhala: ටින් කළ ස්නෝක් මාළු ව්‍යංජනය, දකුණු ප්‍රියතමය
description_tamil: டின்னில் அடைக்கப்பட்ட ஸ்னோக் மீன் குழம்பு, தெற்குப் பிடித்தமானது
